name: DigitalStorytellingWebsite
description: - Make sure NPM is installed   - package.json contains all the dependencies    - After cloning the repository just do `npm install` in the terminal or cmd in the project directory. This should install all the dependencies for this project.    - You will also need Nodemon, which allows you to run and test your application.      - Use this command to install Nodemon: `npm install -g nodemon`
